original_text: Nobody will agree to die on behalf of another person, even if that person has done what is right. Maybe someone might be brave enough to die on behalf of a person who is very good.
korean_text: 의인을 위하여 죽는 자가 쉽지 않고 선인을 위하여 용감히 죽는 자가 혹 있거니와

sentences.original_text: Nobody will agree to die on behalf of another person
sentences.korean_translation: 아무도 다른 사람을 위해 죽으려 하지 않을 것입니다

sentences.original_text: even if that person has done what is right
sentences.korean_translation: 비록 그 사람이 옳은 일을 했더라도

sentences.original_text: Maybe someone might be brave enough
to die on behalf of a person who is very good
sentences.korean_translation: 아주 선한 사람을 위해 죽을 수 있을 만큼
